document_data.name: Bylanna Ianulin
document_data.mainbody: Magistrate '''Bylanna Ianulin''' was an official of the [[Amn]]ian government who presided over the city of [[Athkatla]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref group="note">In the original ''[[Baldur's Gate II: Shadows of Amn]]'', her name is given as Bylanna Lanulin.
document_data.Personality: While she often offered sympathy to those who could not find justice, she was dedicated to upholding the letter of the law.
document_data.Activities:
As magistrate, she oversaw city-wide investigations and made the decisions as to when individuals or groups would be charged with crimes.

Magistrate Ianulin operated under the [[Tessarch]] of the [[Council of Six (Amn)|Council of Six]]. She in turn was served by [[Brega|Chief Inspector Brega]] and the city's other investigators.

Despite her authority and rank, she was powerless to interfere with the actions of the [[Cowled Wizards]].
